DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluates the efficacy and tolerability of an intensified induction and consolidation therapy in combination with rituximab in CD20 positive standard risk patients. Thereafter patients receive additional consolidation and reinduction cycles combined with rituximab. In parallel minimal residual disease is evaluated. After six months and one year the decision on intensification or discontinuation of therapy is made based on results of MRD evaluation
DOC.brief_title: Trial for Treatment of Adult Patients With Standard Risk Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia With Chemotherapy and Rituximab
DOC.criteria: Bprecursor ALL (common / pre BALL) Standard risk CD20 expression >20% Ph/BCRABL negative Age 1565 years (5565 if biologically younger) Written informed consent Severe complications due to leukemia or secondary illnesses Late relapse of childhood ALL Cytostatic pretreatment Pregnancy Severe psychiatric illness or other circumstances which may compromise cooperation of the patient or informed consent Known severe allergy to foreign proteins
